IndexPage.title: Hi, my name is SebastiÃ¡n and I am a software developer.
IndexPage.description: I am a developer specialized in turning ideas into innovative web applications. Discover my portfolio to explore my experience and most recent projects.

AboutPage.title: About Me
AboutPage.paragraph1: I am a web developer and software designer located in Colombia. I am passionate about creating beautiful, functional and user-centric digital experiences. I am always looking for new and innovative ways to bring my clients' visions to life.
AboutPage.paragraph2: I'm interested in the whole web development stack like trying new things and creating great projects. I am an independent and innovative professional. I love sports, gymnastics, anime and reading books.
AboutPage.paragraph3: When I am working on a website or a digital project, I bring my commitment and use the best practices guaranteeing the user experience and a minimalist design. I believe that everything is an Art when you put your consciousness into it.
AboutPage.experience_1_work: I collaborate in various teams to create web applications, implement new functionalities and optimize codes. My experience extends to clients in Latin America, and in addition, he actively participates openly in personal and code projects.
AboutPage.experience_2_work: Worked migrating a JAVA desktop application to a web application with Django, also implemented new functions, refactored new functionalities required by the product team.
AboutPage.education_1_place: Pedagogical and Technological University of Colombia
AboutPage.education_1_info: The degree includes data structures, algorithms, software development, computer systems engineering and artificial intelligence.
AboutPage.education_2_info: Diploma in programming with emphasis on web and mobile development, in order to develop skills in programming and software design.
AboutPage.education_3_info: Complete courses in advanced topics such as web development, Artificial Intelligence and Application Design

ProjectsPage.title: My Projects and Works ðŸš€
ProjectsPage.project_1_summary: StockPro is the solution to an inventory automation problem aimed at the retail sector, allowing users to keep track of their products, sales and customers. I worked for 4 months creating all the functionalities of the system, from design to implementation.
ProjectsPage.project_1_skills: Next.js - Typescript - Tailwind CSS - Context API - React Query - Recharts - Express.js - Swagger - PostgreSQL - Vercel - Railway - Jest - Supertest
ProjectsPage.project_2_summary: This project was done to administer vaccines to cattle on a farm in BoyacÃ¡. It was developed using a microservices architecture.
ProjectsPage.project_2_skills: Flask - Python - Java - Spring Boot - MongoDB - PostgreSQL - MVP - N-capas - Arquitectura Clean - Microservicios - APIGateway
ProjectsPage.project_3_skills: Python - Keras - Tensorflow - Flask - CNN - React - Javascript
